channel.title: Sass on ZAINABED

item.title: Sass Tutorials
item.description: Introduction Sass (Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets) is scripting language which produces Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). Sass is compatible with all CSS version and has assorted features. It is open source and developed in Ruby. What does Sass do In simple terms by using Sass and its features we can create robust and large Style sheet with less effort and in less time. How to Install Sass Sass requires Ruby, so if you are using Windows System then you need to install Ruby first.
